name: Sky Defender (NnNeEediIMm)
description:
Official timer

Sky Defender is a game where you are a tiny rocket and shoot fireballs against infinite waves of enemies. By playing you get coins which you can use to buy new rockets and new fireballs. 

Enemies have a different chance of spawning. When walking you get 10 points every second, and by killing enemy spaceship you get 300 points. Game is more like relaxing themed nothing too serious. 

Game is to relax after hard day. Download now for free or if you want to donate you can, your decision. Made by NnNeEediIMm (14). Here is trailer/teaser short one, hahha here.

***************

Very Soon for iPhone.
